articles.title: Euclid test images tease of riches to come - European Space Agency
articles.description: Euclid’s two instruments have captured their first test images. The mesmerising results indicate that the space telescope will achieve the scientific goals that it has been designed for – and possibly much more.

articles.title: ESA's Aeolus: A Historic End to a Trailblazing Mission - SciTechDaily
